Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement dynamic category management with modal interface

Added comprehensive category management system allowing users to:
- Add custom categories
- Edit/rename categories (updates all expenses)
- Archive categories (hides from forms, preserves data)
- Restore archived categories
- Drag-and-drop reordering (affects dropdown order)
- View expense counts per category

COMPONENTS:
- CategoryManager: Modal with Active/Archived tabs
- Tab-based UI for organization
- Real-time expense count display
- Duplicate detection on new categories

STORAGE LAYER (lib/storage.ts):
- getCategories() - Load all categories
- getActiveCategories() - Non-archived only
- getArchivedCategories() - Archived only
- addCategory() - Create new category
- updateCategoryName() - Rename with expense updates
- archiveCategory() / restoreCategory()
- reorderCategories() - Save drag order
- getCategoryExpenseCounts()

TYPE SYSTEM (types/expense.ts):
- ExpenseCategory now accepts any string
- New Category interface with order/archived status
- DEFAULT_CATEGORIES exported for initialization

INTEGRATION (app/page.tsx):
- Purple "Manage Categories" button in header
- Modal opens on click
- onCategoriesChanged callback refreshes data

All changes persist to localStorage and sync throughout app.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
